answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!You are right. High blood sugar levels are known to cause buzzing in head and are a warning signal. This means that your sugar is going near high danger levels. Please consult a good diabetes specialist, do not self medicate, stick to the medicines or insulin treatment and follow the diet and exercise program religiously.Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: I'm having trouble controllng my diabetis. When my sugars are high I get this really loud buzzing in head. It's not a ringing in the ear, it's in my brain. VERY ANOYING! Is this normal for high sugars?
title: Buzzing in head
